The hors. the shepe [and] the ghoos Horse the ghoos & the sheep Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
[12+] leaves
By W. Caxton, [Westminster : 1477-1478]
By John Lydgate. Title from heading, [A]1r. An edition of: Lydgate, John. The horse the ghoos & the sheep. Imprint from STC. Leaves not signed. In verse. Signatures: [A]1-6+. Imperfect; all after [A]6 lacking. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
